html:
Dec 21 (Reuters) - Repsol SA REP.MC:: *REPSOL AND AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) HAVE SIGNED A COLLABORATION AGREEMENT TO ADVANCE BOTH COMPANIES’ SUSTAINABILITY GOALS *AMAZON WILL PURCHASE RENEWABLE ENERGY GENERATED FROM 234 MW OF CAPACITY *AWS TO PROVIDE REPSOL WITH NEW CLOUD SERVICES AND REPSOL TO SUPPLY RENEWABLE ENERGY TO POWER AMAZON BUSINESS OPERATIONS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 21-DEC-202110:15:26 GMT
